description: For some reason the Colibri app hijacks the .pdf, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt extenstions and tries to open this types of files, even though it can't

The app works as advertised, but every time I open a music file, it shows up. This has happened while opening other file formats as well. Further, the app takes more time to start up than it should, given its feature set.
summary: A Lot of Things left to Fix

description: Looks like it'd be a good, minimal browser but it hijacks other files as the other user mentioned before me.
summary: Same problem as the other user

description:
Good but wish address bar didn't hide.
Need to click on =, File, Open location after every new page.
its fast and minimalist but surfing without tabs is a mess imo, plus you cant use bookmarks without an account which is annoying
I should have read the reviews before installing it. It tries to associate itself with various file formats although it can not open them. Sad. So, basically, does not work well with 19.10
a very nasty it open when ever i click a file

Would open instead of vlc, haha, crazy crazy.
The software looks interesting, and I think its good idea, but not when I'm trying to watch something... haha
This app modified some of my shortcuts and also became the default app for some fileformats, like images and music? Not really useful.

it literally broke my opening folders on desktop and files, shortcuts, every time it opened colibri not even the folder. 
From the normal folder aplication i could get to everything but from desktop or other it allways wanted open with ôcolibri" thus not opening nothing. 
LUL

AND IT WATNTS TEDIOUS REGISTRATION TRU EMAIL AND RECHON EMAIL AND OPENING EMAIL THEN PASSWORD PICKING FOR THE WHOLE REGISTRATION....ONLY AFTER THAT YOU CAN THEN SIGN IN IN THE APPLICATION AND GET STARTING USING IT. WHUUUUUAAAAAAATTTT?????? FIRE THAT MAN WHO APPROVED THIS. ITS INSANE. THIS IS AN BROWSER JESUS.
Good and easy to use but you can't use bookmarks without account

I found it insanely amazing and I can focus now.

NOTE- For the people who want to focus on particular things only.

$ you can open one-tab at a time.

$ dark UI is amazing

$ browser-internal search-engine is pretty smart like if you search
 "periodic table" , instead of opening google it will open pub-chem.
 "stream music", it will open tune-in music.
 "password", it will open google-pass-manager.
 and many more smart-search like that.

$ On other browsers if you're taking online test , it will store data in cookies.So you can go back and chill in exams but not with this.
You JUST have to COMPLETE it no matter what. [doesn't store cookie]

$ well, WHAT YOU'RE WAITING FOR JUST DOWNLOAD IT NOW!

[add more to this review , if you find more easter-eggs / hidden features]

It is beautifully-designed and it is really fast. The settings are simple and user-friendly. For me Colibri is the best choice for browsing the web. This app as far as I can remember never went non-responding on my desktop. Thank you.
summary: I like this app. And I recommend it

description: It's an excellent idea, it has a future, but it still needs many improvements such as hiding the scroll bar on the right, removing the need for a login to use it and understanding how the inclusion of links works. In the toggle view include the information from the left menu, and in the left include the hidden navigable tabs. Redesign the top of the page to make it more pleasing.
summary: A good idea, but still need something..

description:
It’s a cool idea with potential, but it definitely needs some work. I was trying it out on Ubuntu and ran into font issues—some characters showed up as little boxes. 🙃

I think the concept behind it is solid, especially considering the future possibilities. However, to make it truly user-friendly, we’ll have to address those font glitches. Maybe some compatibility tweaks or font substitution could do the trick. Keep tinkering, and you’ll get there! 💪
summary: Font Adventures: Navigating Ubuntu’s Character Mystery

description: good browser. had an issue but it has been fixed after contacting the support!
Einfache Bookmarks brauchen ein Konto beim Betreiber. Das kommt für mich nicht in Frage.
summary: Aufgeräumte Oberfläche, schnelles Rendern. Leider an Konto gebunden

description: I can not install it on my system (ubuntu 19.04), try to install it from the terminal or through the website and none of them worked, could instead of a snap file, could also be downloaded in formart .deb please?

Es elegante y rápido, solo que deben mejorar la personalización del navegador, cuesta un poco copiar o pegar texto tanto dentro del navegador como de otras aplicaciones externas, ya que muchas veces no lo hace; no funcionan las teclas especiales dentro de este, espero que arreglen en una actualización.
summary: Rápido y elegante, pero faltan mejorar aspectos

description: Funcionaba bien hasta hace unas 4 semanas que deje de ocupar este equipo con Ubuntu 18.04 LTS, ahora al querer abrir una página se cierra la ventana

L'interface épurée m'a attiré mais impossible pour moi de travailler sans onglet, les onglets sont essentiels quand on fait certaines tache. Et surtout Colibri s'est mis à ouvrir la plupart des type de fichier par defaut comme les fichiers txt ce qui m'a agacé. De plus beaucoup de mal avec l'idée qu'il faut obligatoirement un compte pour utiliser certaines fonctions de base

Je suis sous Ubuntu 21.0 et pas moyen de faire fonctionner le navigateur. Cela tourne en boucle sur créer un compte et mot de passe oublié. 
Dommage, j'aurai bien voulu tester se fonctionnement sans onglet.
очень быстро работает
It doesn't work at all on Ubuntu 18.04. It doesn't even start. But Windows-version works fine. I like this browser but at the moment I can't try it on Linux.
ubuntu 20.04 после установки запустился, потом больше не запускается
Донт рашен меню. Итс вери бед. Ай ду нот узи зис продукт. Итс вери бед.
